main.name: Biniyam Getaneh
main.description: Experienced  Software developer, fast and eager learner with a good analytical thinking, and has good interpersonal skills. Strives to learn new technologies.
main.bio: Experienced Software Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in Angular, React,Node,Asp,Flutter and Android Native. Strong Development professional with a Bsc focused in Computer Science from University of Gondar.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a Biniyam and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over
